user.title: My account
user.intro: Manage your local account, backups, and security settings.

userId.title: User ID
userId.desc: Your unique identifier on this device.

backup.title: Backup
backup.desc: Choose a save location, set and confirm a backup PIN, then store the file safely. You can restore it later via the import/restore option.

changePin.title: Change PIN
changePin.desc: Set a new PIN for this user on this device.

resetKeys.title: Reset security keys
resetKeys.desc: Generates new keys used to encrypt your messages and clears chat history.

delete.title: Delete user
delete.desc: Remove this user and all local data.

profile.title: My profile
profile.intro: Your profile is stored locally and used only for your own content. You can optionally share it with contacts.

name.title: Display name
name.desc: Shown only on your own messages, comments, and notes on this device.

avatar.title: Profile picture
avatar.desc: Choose an image from your device or Unsplash; the avatar stays local unless you share it with contacts.

style.title: Default style
style.desc: Choose the font style used for your messages, comments, notes, and more.

systemMessages.title: System messages
systemMessages.intro: System messages keep you informed about moderation and system events. Tap a message to see details.

inbox.title: Inbox
inbox.desc: Shows all system messages; unread ones are highlighted.

filters.title: Filters
filters.desc: Switch between unread, read, and all.

details.title: Details
details.desc: Open a message to view case info, reason, content type, and timestamp.

actions.title: Actions
actions.desc: Mark as read/unread, delete a message, or open the case status link when available.

deleteAll.title: Delete all
deleteAll.desc: Removes all messages in the current list.
